public class Utils {
        public static void CopyStream(InputStream is, OutputStream os)
        {
            final int buffer_size=1024;
            try
            {
                byte[] bytes=new byte[buffer_size];
                for(;;)
                {
                  int count=is.read(bytes, 0, buffer_size);
                  if(count==-1)
                      break;
                  os.write(bytes, 0, count);
                }
            }
            catch(Exception ex){}
        }
    }
